title: J.B. Hutto & The Hawks - Masters Of Modern Blues (1967) [FLA
description:
Great Chicago blues, J.B. Hutto with high-class support (Walter Horton, Johnny Young, Fred Below)




J.B. Hutto & the Hawks: Masters Of Modern Blues

Label: Testament Records - TCD 5020 


original vinyl release 1967, CD release 1995

recorded at One-derful Studios, Chicago, Il, June 1966



Tracklist:

1 	Dust My Broom 	
2 	Mistake In Life	
3 	Goin' Down Slow	
4 	Lulubelle's Here 	
5 	She's So Sweet 	
6 	My Kind Of Woman 	
7 	Pet Cream Man 	
8 	Blues Stay Away From Me 	
9 	The Girl I Love 	
10 	Sloppy Drunk 	
11 	Wild Wild Women 	
12 	Bluebird 



Lineup:

J.B. Hutto - vocals, guitar
Johnny Young - guitar
Big Walter Horton - harmonica
Lee Jackson - bass
Fred Below - drums
